themes: funding disparities for Black and Brown organizations
key_phrases: Stop towing the line on equality and actually do equity
Stop punishing black and brown organizations with being resilient
Give the money to black and brown organizations
let the go create amazing work LIKE THEY'VE ALWAYS DONE ON NO MONEY
barriers_identified: Resilience expectations placed on Black and Brown organizations
Lack of direct funding for Black and Brown organizations
solutions_proposed: Provide direct funding to Black and Brown organizations
Shift from equality to equity in funding
